title: Simplify landing page: remove Our Work and make content text-only; update service areas list

requirements.text: Remove the “Our Work” section from the landing page so it is no longer displayed anywhere.

quotes: Please remove the 'Our Work' section and all service images.

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page no longer renders the Our Work/gallery section

quotes: Please remove the 'Our Work' section and all service images.
